303.question: How big are the datasets?

6-Table2-1.png: The datasets are large, with a total of 1137 documents in the English (Source) dataset, 280 documents in the German (Target) dataset, 451 documents in the Spanish (Target) dataset, 322 documents in the Italian (Target) dataset, 396 documents in the Japanese (Target) dataset, 390 documents in the Portuguese (Target) dataset, and 479 documents in the English (Source) dataset. The Arabic (Target) dataset has the smallest number of documents, with 323 documents. The ACE05 dataset has the smallest number of documents among all datasets, with 479 documents. The Chinese (Target) dataset has the largest number of documents, with 507 documents.

303.answer:
In-house dataset consists of  3716 documents 
ACE05 dataset consists of  1635 documents
